<!-- Grille de produits -->
<ul class=""product-list__content product-grid-b"" data-target=""product-list"">
<li class=""product-grid-b__item product product_171079"" data-alcool-warning=""0"" data-product-id=""171079"" data-promo=""1"" data-vll=""0"">
<div class=""card-product-a"">
